column4: Hi everyone! gotta Printing Problem. Have a Printer connected to ubuntu. Server settings are fine, the Printes is published, by my legacy 7 system can't find it. And yes, i do try to add a printer in this format: http://krzyhoo:631/printers/HPDJ920C
any clues?

Hi everyone! gotta Printing Problem. Have a Printer connected to ubuntu. Server settings are fine, the Printes is published, by my legacy 7 system can't find it. And yes, i do try to add a printer in this format: http://krzyhoo:631/printers/HPDJ920C
sorry for repeating
but the screen just flys by
netstat -tulpen|grep :631
got 3 entries: tcp, tcp versin 6 and udp
ok, so cups listens to the network
am running out of ideas
have you tried using the ip, not the hostname (shouldn't make a difference, but...)
yup, did that to
do you speak/read german? i'mnot sure if this helps, but maybe it's worth a look http://kaoso.org/2010/09/09/windows-7-netzwerkdrucker-hp-laserjet-5p-cups-ipp-hinzufugen/
sure i do! i live in germany :)
don't get me wrong, but i know lots of people living here not speaking 2 german words...
i know them as well. I am the kind of person that values integration
besides, i know germans that don't spek their language:) just mumble in the Krass-Deutsch
sooo true, badly true
besides in my line of business, i need to be able to communicate with my customers :)
you wil never guess. it was the ip thing
pebkac
things could be so easy ...
http://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/PEBKAC#P
ha ha ;)
